title: The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', now it changes with settings.
description: When using the hyperlink builder in the software, the title is not consistent as expected.
OB: The title of the hyperlink builder changes depending on the settings used, which is not the expected behavior.
EB: The expected behavior is that the title of the hyperlink builder should always be 'Hyperlink Options' regardless of the settings chosen.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the software.
2. Navigate to the hyperlink builder.
3. Set a label hyperlink as 'www.actuate.com'.
4. Observe that the title of the hyperlink builder changes based on the settings.
